remarks: Two joins with a common atom have a nonzero meet.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Jul-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
2atm2at.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
2atm2at.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
2atm2at.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
2atm2at.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
2atm2atN $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A /\ R e. A ) ) -> ( ( R .\/ P ) ./\ ( R .\/ Q ) ) =/= .0. ) $.
